job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
PeopleReign, the leading AI System of Intelligence for IT and HR employee service, is hiring the top software engineers on the planet.
Ready to create products that will define how the next billion employees work? Ready to test your limits and learn from a world-class team? Ready to do the best work of your life?
We need you.
Join one of the hottest companies in one of the hottest spaces in enterprise software. We're hiring full-stack developers to partner with our team of Data Scientists, AI engineers, and linguists.
Our SaaS platform is used by millions of employees around the world to get better IT and HR service at work. Customers routinely upgrade to PeopleReign from IBM Watson and Microsoft LUIS for better NLP, more accurate AI, and a fully automated data pipeline.
Responsibilities
Partner with engineers and product teams to develop SaaS products
Deliver high-quality, data-driven features on time
Lead architecture discussions and participate actively in design reviews
Own the lifecycle of your code from unit testing to deployment to monitoring
Maintain
Requirements
Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or related field
Demonstrated success in high-growth, startup environments
Exceptional written and oral communication skills
Advanced proficiency in coding (multiple languages including Python), databases, API design, cloud architectures (including AWS and Azure), frontend frameworks (including React, Vue, and Angular), integrations
Advanced proficiency in git-based workflows
Bonus: demonstrated success working with AI and data science frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, and scikit-learn
